thread.title: gtx 10xx performance issues???

comments.text: i was talking to zid and we came to a somewhat conclusion. there seems to be a performance issue with 10 series gpus. can anyone else support this theory?
i my self have a 1080 gpu and lag sometimes when others dont.
i have a 1080 and seem to lag aswell, fps usually just keeps dropping till it crashes, hasnt happened for a while since turning off shadowplay and siabling bit defender while i pla
i do lag when other people say they dont.
